def_cn: 妙极的;惹人喜爱的;了不起的
def_en: If you describe something or someone as incredible, you like them very much or are impressed by them, because they are extremely or unusually good.

def_cn: 不可思议的;难以置信的
def_en: If you say that something is incredible, you mean that it is very unusual or surprising, and you cannot believe it is really true, although it may be.
You use incredible to emphasize the degree, amount, or intensity of something.
